basics.name: Stjepan Treger
basics.label: Web developer
basics.summary: I come from Požega, Croatia, and currently I live in Zagreb. I have studied Faculty of Geodesy, Master of Science in Engineering in Zagreb and in Novi Sad but never graduated from either one. From early childhood I have played with computers and similar technologies, from hardware assembly to software programming (and almost anything in-between). I'm a huge geek especially for new technologies and I like to be abreast with latest software and hardware product solutions. I enjoy working on open-source projects and advocating for privacy and freedom friendly tools and software.

work.summary: Leading a team on huge Drupal 7 and Drupal 8 commerce projects. Succesfully delivering re-design and architecture re-implementation.
highlights: Leading a multi-cultural global team while working on successful projects
Acquia, Platform.sh, AWS, Fastly, custom environments

work.summary: Setup and managment of different Linux servers for Drupal websites. Nginx and Apache optimizations correlated with various PHP-FPM and FCGI setups.
highlights: Solr, Redis, Docker setups for all environments

work.summary: Designing the architecture of the robust systems, including project with migration of Drupal 7 to Drupal 8.
highlights: Drupal project architect on a big Drupal 8 project
Worked as full stack developer on multiple medium sized Drupal projects
Getting more experience with Twig and Javascript

work.summary: Implementation of Drupal 8 project as a big platform for specialized uses in tourism. Several medium sized projects from event like websites to applications used in medical organizations.
highlights: Project manager role with several of successful projects

work.summary: Leading Drupal agency in Croatia, delivering complex web solutions and online platforms for international clients.

volunteer.summary: We bring world-class, highly distributed and decentralized technologies to their limits.
Popcorn Time streams movies and TV shows from torrents.
OpenStreetMap powers map data on thousands of web sites, mobile apps, and hardware devices
Translation for multiple OSS projects including but not limited to 7-Zip, Adblock Plus, AdBlock, MPC-HC, SumatraPDF, uBlock Origin, Chromium, Mozilla, RocketChat

education.institution: Faculty of Technical Sciences, University of Novi Sad
Faculty of Geodesy, University of Zagreb

languages.fluency: Listening: C2, Reading: C2, Spoken interaction: C1, Spoken production: C1, Writing: C2
Listening: B1, Reading: B1, Spoken interaction: A2, Spoken production: A2, Writing: B1
